title:
NG8107: Optional chain not nullable

可選鏈不能是可空值
contents:
mode_edit

NG8107: Optional chain not nullable 可選鏈不能是可空值link

說明link

Descriptionlink

此診斷會檢測可選鏈運運算元（.?）的左側有沒有在其 Angular 範本中包括 null 或 undefined 型別。

This diagnostic detects when the left side of an optional chain operation (.?) does not include null or undefined in its type in Angular templates.

import {Component} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ template: `
{{ foo?.bar }}
`, // … }) class MyComponent { // `foo` is declared as an object which *cannot* be `null` or `undefined`. foo: { bar: string} = { bar: 'bar'}; }

我該怎麼辦？link

What should I do instead?link

更新範本和宣告的型別以同步兩者。仔細檢查輸入的型別，並確認它是否真是可空的。

Update the template and declared type to be in sync. Double-check the type of the input and confirm whether it is actually expected to be nullable.

如果輸入應該是可空的，請在其型別中新增 null 或 undefined 以表明這一點。

If the input should be nullable, add null or undefined to its type to indicate this.

import {Component} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ // If `foo` is nullish, `bar` won't be evaluated and the express will return the nullish value (`null` or `undefined`). template: `
{{ foo?.bar }}
`, // … }) class MyComponent { foo: { bar: string} | null = { bar: 'bar'}; }

如果輸入不應該為空，則刪除 ? 運運算元。

If the input should not be nullable, delete the ? operator.

import {Component} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ // Template always displays `bar` as `foo` is guaranteed to never be `null` or `undefined` template: `
{{ foo.bar }}
`, // … }) class MyComponent { foo: { bar: string} = { bar: 'bar'}; }

如果我無法避免這種情況怎麼辦？link

What if I can't avoid this?link

可以透過編輯專案的 tsconfig.json 檔案來禁用此診斷：

This diagnostic can be disabled by editing the project's tsconfig.json file:

{ "angularCompilerOptions": { "extendedDiagnostics": { "checks": { "optionalChainNotNullable": "suppress" } } } }

有關更多資訊，請參閱擴充診斷配置。

See extended diagnostic configuration for more info.
